name: ALT_ORD_PROV_SINGL
description: This table contains single response items for alternate ordering providers.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: ALT_ORD_PRV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the alternate ordering provider.

columns.name: ALT_ORD_PRV_CITY
columns.description: The city for alternate ordering providers.

columns.name: ALT_ORD_PRV_ZIP
columns.description: The zipcode for alternate ordering providers.

columns.name: ALT_ORD_PRV_PHONE
columns.description: The phone number for alternate ordering providers.

columns.name: ALT_ORD_PRV_FAX
columns.description: The fax number for alternate ordering providers.

columns.name: ALT_ORD_PRV_EMAIL
columns.description: The email address for alternate ordering providers.

columns.name: ALT_ORD_PRV_UPIN
columns.description: The Unique physician identification number (UPIN) for alternate ordering providers.

columns.name: ALT_ORD_PRV_TAX_ID
columns.description: The tax identification number for alternate ordering providers.

columns.name: ALT_ORD_PRV_TITLE_NAME
columns.description: The title of the alternate ordering provider.

columns.name: ALT_ORD_PRV_RVW_C_NAME
columns.description: The last reviewed status of the alternate ordering provider.

columns.name: ALT_ORD_PRV_HOUSE_N
columns.description: The house number for alternate ordering providers.

columns.name: ALT_ORD_PRV_DIST_C_NAME
columns.description: The district for alternate ordering providers.
